name: Questions
author: RiceKirby
summary: Is this even Mafia? Nah. Answer 3 questions correctly and win the game. Any wrong answer and you are out! [Want to submit questions? Check this: http://goo.gl/qDHWL1 ]

sides.winmsg: Congratulations! ~Players~ answered correctly their 3 questions and won this game!

changelog.15.05.2015: 52 new questions added, mostly for the Pokémon Games category. Thanks to the anonymous contributors.
changelog.08.05.2015: First batch of questions submitted by players added (around 25 new questions). Reduced time to input your answers.
changelog.22.03.2015: Theme re-coded. Number of questions increased from 54 to 150.
